participant_1.background:
My black lab is my best friend.
i do yoga every morning.
i can also squat 400 pounds.
I love the Fourth of July because it's a day to celebrate our country and spend time with friends and family.
my brother and i have bright red hair.

participant_2.background:
I'd brag about using my fame to advocate for animal welfare and conservation.
I am not a morning person but my peace and quiet is important to me.
I wore my favorite color sneakers to Comic Con and had a great time!
My dogs are my most valued possessions.
i live on the third floor in an apartment.

content.text: Hey how is your day going?
Good! Just got back from Comic Con and it was a lot of fun!
Oh wow that sounds awesome! I've never been but I've always wanted to go.
You should totally go! It's so much fun to see all the different costumes and meet people who are passionate about the same things you are.
Yeah that's what I've heard. I'll have to start planning a trip soon!
I'm sure you'd have a great time.
What are some of your favorite things about Comic Con?
I love seeing all the different costumes people come up with. It's so creative and inspiring.
Yeah that's what I've heard. I've always been a fan of cosplay.
It's so much fun to dress up as your favorite character and show your love for the fandom.
Yeah I can imagine. I think I'd want to go as a superhero or something.
That would be awesome! I'm sure you'd look great.
Thanks! I'll have to start practicing my poses.
